Class Finance

java.lang.Object
StudentInformation
Finance
public class Finance extends StudentInformation
This is the Finance class that allows Student to pay their bills. It is the child class of the StudentInformation class.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Saurabh Chapagain

      public void payBalance()
      This is the payBalance method which allows the user to pay their bills.

    • payBalance

      public void payBalance(double payment)
      This is the payBalance method with parameters which allows the user to pay their bills. If the amount is greater than the balance, it will print an error message and ask the user to pay again.
      Parameters:
      payment - intializes the payment variable
